job_description:
Sr Sales Manager / Director, NAMER

New York

A BIT ABOUT US

We're at the forefront of one of the most exciting evolutions of our generation - remote staffing. No longer do employers have to hire according to geography, and no longer do employees have to worry about proximity to work and daily commutes.

Today, companies can hire the best talent they can find, anywhere in the world. But they need digital solutions to help them streamline the process...

We are Multiplier! Our global employment platform empowers companies to hire people all across the world by managing the complexities of local compliance, labor contracts, payroll, benefits and taxes - all from one software system. It's a game changer!

We're on a mission to impact economies of scale by enabling companies to hire the best candidate for the job, regardless of location.

We're backed by some of the best in the game (Sequoia and Tiger Global), led by domain level experts, growing, and seeking brilliant like minded enthusiasts to join our team.

A BIT ABOUT THE OPPORTUNITY

We're building a world class sales org to help us get there. Our Regional Sales leaders are responsible for helping us build world class sales teams, processes, and to deliver on ambitious revenue targets.

We're seeking a proven commercial leader, who knows how to build a culture of over-achievers predicted on discipline and execution.

This role will report directly into our CRO, and work closely with peers and cross functional stakeholders. Process, efficiency, and tenacity will be critical to your success in this role.

What you'll do :
• Meet / exceed the revenue targets for your region.
• Build and execute effective GTM plans and sales motions to sell up-market and maximize ROI on our salesforce.
• Forecast accurately, and build a highly disciplined data culture within your team.
• Consistently deliver on staffing and budgeting needs to build a successful, over-achieving sales team.
• Coach AEs on hard and soft skills as they relate to prospecting, engagement, nurturing, closing, and scaling.
• Maximize key sales metrics, like lead-MQL-SQL-close rates, ACV, and time to value.
• Help build career plans for your staff, and maximize retention of top talent.
• Help us build a predictable, repeatable, and scalable sales engine.
• Provide access to a rolodex of high value prospects through your personal and professional network.
• Deliver on quarterly OKRs, with a laser focus on data.

What you'll bring :
• Min 5 years in sales management (at least 3 in b2b SaaS / HR Tech), with a track record of achieving quota at least 2 of the past 3 years.
• Obsession over data and analytics, and the expressed ability to convert to actionable insights.
• Change management experience, a steady hand and resilience in the face of organizational change.
• The ability to work independently, problem solve proactively, and collaborate effectively.
• Excellent leadership, communication and presentation skills.
• A process oriented approach to sales.
• Work ethic beyond the norm, and a commitment to excellence as a leader.

What we'll provide for you :
• Ability to contribute to this business at a high level.
• Autonomy within your role.
• Ability to work fully-remotely.
• Working with a compassionate, energetic, inspired, ambitious, global, and diverse team.
• Opportunity to grow within a fast-growth business.
• Competitive benefits, compensation, and culture of recognition.
• Generous holiday policy.
• A commitment to positively impact your career.

A BIT ABOUT YOU

You're a company builder, not just a sales leader. You absolutely love working with a unique and inspired workforce, and being part of a dispersed team.

Startups excite you because you covet the opportunity to contribute to building something special, early on. You understand the art and science of sales, have been successful as an outbound sales rep yourself, and use systems and mathematics to succeed.

You've been successful in management, and relish the opportunity to grow. You're progressively minded, creative, accountable, and quirky in your own way.

If this sounds like you, we'd love to hear from you.

THANK YOU!

Last updated : 2024-03-07
